comments:

getting this error during resource event notification (note: the project has
been renamed but it doesn't look like that should matter):

What build are you using. I think this has been fixed.

The runtime bridge framework has just been rewritten. Try this with the 
official M9 build when it's declared.

saw the bug this morning with the latest versions of the
wst.common.project.facet plugins (note: the projects and server runtime had been
created w/ earlier versions so if the content/format of the relevant metadata
has changed the problem may be fixed...)
